title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, May 23, 2021
description: Today marks the birth of poet Jane Kenyon (1974). She said, “Be a good steward of your gifts. Protect your time. Feed your inner life.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today marks the birth of poet Jane Kenyon (1974). She said, “Be a good steward of your gifts. Protect your time. Feed your inner life.”
